text: Nina Chernova was a Russian silent film actress. She acted the role of Vera Dubrokskaia, the heroine in Yevgeni Bauer's Twilight of a Woman's Soul (1913), making her "the first professional female performer in Russian film". ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:19th-century births Category:Year of death missing Category:20th-century deaths Category:Russian silent film actresses
title: Nina Chernova
